::Lord Jhiaxus::

The advanced Decepticon fighter known as Lord Jhiaxus slowly makes his way through a forest area. He is kocking down trees and breaking up the landscape as he goes.

Jhiaxus: Primus, I hate organics. I can't wait untill our forces totally wipe this planet out of existence. Optimus Prime was a fool to have cut off all contact between Earth and Transformers after the signing of the Pax Cybertronia. He must have never suspected that some Decepticons would escape to the other side of the galaxy to return well after the war had ended. These Maximals and Predacons only knew of Earths location via the Golden Disc, but I remember it so well. The pathetic humans now control their own star sector with no Transformer involvment. Leaving them wide open. Their whole race will pay for their ancestor's sins: for aiding the Autobots.

Jhiaxus' comm system picks up on Kup's signal, giving away Kup's crash location.

Jhiaxus: Oh I do hope that old Autobot is still alive. Shooting him down isn't as satifying as crushing his spark in my bare hand!

Jhiaxus transforms to jet mode and heads for Kup's location.

OOC: I'm not having Rodimus pick up the signal yet because he is in radio silence. Plus I wanted to get some involvent going in the RPG, so I hoped someone else would respond.

 	      
---------------------------------
Ahhh...imagining that irresistible "new car" smell?
 Check outnew cars at Yahoo! Autos.
